description: This file implements the Flutter widget `CalendarPage` that displays a monthly calendar with festival markers, supports day selection, and shows details via modal sheets. It also manages festival data and Tithi information, referencing models and a mock repository.

classes.name: CalendarPage
classes.description: A stateful widget providing a calendar view with festival markers and day details.

classes.name: _DayDetailsSheet
classes.description: A stateless widget displaying detailed information about a selected day.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes festival data for the current month.

methods.name: _festsOn
methods.description: Filters festivals occurring on a given day.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree including the calendar and festivals list.
